mapper.select: select rid,name,introduction,getcodetxt('yesorno',ismastercanown) ismastercanown from role order by rid desc limit #{startnum},#{getrows}
select c.name from role a, ir_role_module b,module c where a.rid = b.rid and b.mid = c.mid and a.rid = #{rid} order by c.sort
mapper.update: update role set name = #{name},introduction = #{introduction} where rid = #{rid};
mapper.select: select b.uid,b.name,b.mphone,b.loginname,getcodetxt('gender', gender) gender,getcodetxt('usertype', type) typestr from ir_user_role a, user b where a.uid = b.uid and a.rid = #{rid} and b.isdel = '0' order by type desc

select b.uid,b.name,b.mphone,b.loginname,getcodetxt('gender', gender) gender,getcodetxt('usertype', type) typestr from user b where b.isdel = '0' and not exists(select 1 from ir_user_role a where b.uid = a.uid and a.rid = #{rid}) order by type desc
mapper.delete: delete from ir_user_role where rid = #{rid} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select b.uid,b.name,b.mphone,b.loginname,getcodetxt('gender', gender) gender,getcodetxt('usertype', type) typestr from user b where b.isdel = '0' and b.type = '2' and not exists(select 1 from ir_user_role a where b.uid = a.uid and a.rid = #{rid}) order by type desc
select ismastercanown from role where rid = #{rid}
